original_title: Nisei Soldiers: Japanese American G.I. Joes
overview: Leaving internment camps to defend their country in Europe, Japanese-American Nisei soldiers of WWII became the most decorated unit in American history.  This film tells their story.
tagline: They were Americans removed from their homes, mistrusted by their country, and served it with the greatest honor.
title: Nisei Soldiers: Japanese American G.I. Joes
